snippet: LEAD: A nine-month investigation has cleared four charitable foundations created by the indicted financier Michael Milken and his family, the state Attorney General's office said Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: A nine-month investigation has cleared four charitable foundations created by the indicted financier Michael Milken and his family, the state Attorney General's office said Wednesday.
